transformations.name: Model
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(movie = toString(byName('movie')),
		title = toString(byName('title')),
		genres = toString(byName('genres')),
		year = toString(byName('year')),
		Rating = toString(byName('Rating')),
		RottenTomato = toString(byName('RottenTomato'))) ~> Model
Model sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['myfile123.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
